definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><comment pinned="false" h="70" w="226">This makes the sounds random, you can remove this if you want the sound to play all at the same time.</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><field name="sound">block.fire.ambient</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">You can use this as an update tick procedure to play sounds when the block is placed down.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.75</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This controls how loud the sound places default is "1"</comment></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the tone of which the sound plays at default is "1"</comment></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
